sn22.18:4.3: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rūpassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:4.4: Aniccasambhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ kuto niccaṃ bhavissati.
sn22.18:4.6: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo vedanāya uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:4.7: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, vedanā kuto niccā bhavissati.
sn22.18:4.10: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo saṅkhārānaṃ uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:4.11: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā kuto niccā bhavissanti.
sn22.18:4.13: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo viññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:4.14: Aniccasambhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ kuto niccaṃ bhavissati.
